title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository with CLI and REST API to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source LLMs locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints for chat, generate, and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (predecessor to Open WebUI) for chatting with any Ollama model; markdown, code highlighting, RAG.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor project that adds workspace teams, RAG pipelines, and plugin store atop Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper with conversation history, markdown rendering, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; sync/async APIs, POJO model mapping, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with generate, chat, and embedding endpoints; supports .NET 6+.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API using reqwest & tokio.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built with Tauri + React for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Experimental CLI that replicates OpenAI Codex flow using CodeLlama via Ollama for local code generation.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hostable Telegram bot that forwards user messages to any Ollama model and streams replies.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models into Discord servers with slash commands and conversation threads.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc. maintained by Ollama team.
